items.content_html: The React Simple Todo List App is a lightweight and intuitive task management application built using the React JavaScript library. This open-source project provides an easy way to create, manage, and organize your daily tasks and to-do items in a clean and minimalist interface.
items.title: rasel-swe/React-Todo_App: The React Simple Todo List App is a lightweight and intuitive task management application built using the React JavaScript library. This open-source project provides an easy way to create, manage, and organize your daily tasks and to-do items in a clean and minimalist interface.
